1.title: Fiona Frenchy's Big Dive
1.plot: The Num Noms Kitchen Dipper Diving Competition is beginning, and all of the Snackables Dippers are ready to compete. Simone Seeds and Tyler Tomato perform a perfectly synchronized dive, followed by Salty Princess and Ketchup Crinkles. But when it's Fiona Frenchy's turn, she can't. It's too scary to dive. Luckily, her Little Dipper friend Vincent Vines is here to help.

2.title: Nilla Dough Gets Magicianed
2.plot: Magic is in the air in the Num Noms Kitchen. Nilla Dough is putting on an exciting magic show for all the Num Noms, but everyone is in for a surprise when a NEW Num Nom magically appears. Fancy Peep the Snow Cone Topping is from the land of Snackables and he has his own magic trick up his sleeve. With a tap of the magic pretzel wand, the air is filled with Snackables Snow Cone Magic Snow. But the trick isn't over yet - more of the Snow Cone Toppings join the fun. There's nothing more magical than new friends.

1.title: The Birthday Party
1.plot: Connie Confetti brings a surprising present to Orange Swirl's birthday party.

2.title: Lip Gloss Truck
2.plot: When the Lip Gloss Truck opens for business, not everyone is patient enough to wait in line to be served.

3.title: Pip, Pup and Pop's Fun Fair
3.plot: Pip, Pup and Pop head to the funfair for some fun! But things don't go quite to plan...

4.title: Peppy Roni's Freezer Fun
4.plot: Peppy Roni wants to join in the frosty fun by trying ice skating. It's not as easy as it looks though!

5.title: Candie Puffs: Dancing Queen
5.plot: Everyone loves a dance party, especially Num Noms! Disaster nearly strikes with some kitchen mishaps, but in the end it all works out.

6.title: Brunch Bunch: To the Rescue!
6.plot: Jammin' Razzy Go-Go gets herself into a bit of a sticky situation. Can Maple Cakes and the Brunch Bunch come to the rescue in time?

7.title: Twinzy Puffs' Wild Ride
7.plot: Twinzy Puffs gets into trouble when some balloons get out of control. Thankfully Num Noms are there to save the day.

8.title: Num Nom's New Year's Eve Countdown
8.plot: The Num Noms love to get together to ring in the New Year. Join their Snackables celebration as they do their best to make it to midnight.

9.title: Mr. And Mrs. Icing Say "I Do"
9.plot: Mr. And Mrs. Icing are tying the knot. But right before they say "I do!" something happens that sends Mr. Icing on an important mission. Luckily, Mrs. Icing is there to provide some much needed help. Joined by friends Connie Confetti, Van Minty, Strawberry Froyo, Mara Schino, and more, the whole team works together to solve the problem. Will Mr. And Mrs. Icing get their "Happily Ever After"?

10.title: Van Minty's Great Cake Bake Off
10.plot: It is up to Van Minty to judge a Great Cake Bake Off between his friends. When Choco Berry and teammate Raspberry Cream go head to head against Raspberry Go Go and Peachy Light-Up, who will win?

11.title: Becky Banana's Donut Delight
11.plot: It appears that Becky Banana has a sweet tooth. She loves donuts, especially playing with them in fun and interesting ways. But when the fun gets out of control, her friend Ava Apple experiences a mishap and ends up in a precarious position. It's up to Becky Banana to save the day.

12.title: Be My Valentine, Candy Hearts!
12.plot: Valentine's Day is almost here and love is in the air for the entire Num Noms crew. Everyone's paired up at the dance except for Candy Hearts and Van Minty. But when Van Minty tries to win Candy Hearts' affection with a shower of romantic gifts like flowers and chocolate, things don't go as planned and some hilarious mishaps take place.

13.title: Sara S'mores' Exciting Expedition
13.plot: A relaxing fishing trip for Sara S'mores turns into a scary adventure when she is attacked by what looks like a giant sea monster. It takes all her berry best Num Noms friends Willy Waffles, Berry Cakes, Choco-Berry, Grape Gummy, and Mango Jelly Go-Go to pull her to safety from the ferocious beast.

14.title: Cherry Light-Up's Bright Idea!
14.plot: When things go awry for the #NumNoms right before the start of the big freezer race, Cherry Light-Up must think fast to save the day. What's Cherry Light-Up's "bright" idea? Who will win the coveted gold Freezie Pop trophy?

15.title: Surprise in a Jar
15.plot: Connie Confetti and Candy Puffs are on the hunt for a way to cool down when they come across a funny way to prank their friends using a jar. When Tropi-Cali Pop, Nana Berry, and Raspberry Cream try to get even things don't go according to plan - but it ends up helping the gang create a crazy contraption to cool everyone off.

16.title: Courtney Candy Serves Up Trouble
16.plot: Courtney Candy and Choco Swirl are competing in a Ping-Pong match and the entire #NumNoms crew is there to cheer them on. When the ball rolls off the counter, Courtney Candy steps in with some creative ideas to keep the game going using things from the kitchen. It takes a few tries, but finally Courtney Candy finds the perfect solution that lets all the Num Noms join in on the fun.

17.title: Sugary Glaze's Sweet Celebration
17.plot: Sugary Glaze and her friends Raspberry Cream, Candy Hearts, and Trop-Cali Pop are having nice, relaxing tea party, but then the Num Noms Lights crew take over the radio and decide they'd rather have a dance party. After a misunderstanding over the tunes, the radio breaks, but luckily Sugary Glaze and Orange Light-Up discover a creative way for everyone to have musical fun!

18.title: Papa Corn's Shadowy Showdown
18.plot: After Mama Corn puts the kids Pip, Pop, and Pup Corn to bed, it's time for Papa Corn and Momma to go out for a romantic date. The couple find a fun way to play with shadows against the wall until a spooky shadow scares them both. Papa Corn springs to action to protect Mama, but luckily the ferocious beast isn't exactly what it seems.

1.title: Princess Buttercream's Cutest-Ever Crowning
1.plot: Princess Buttercream is so excited for her royal crowning, especially the sparkly new crown. When guards Sara S'mores and Orange Swirl get distracted, Princess Buttercream finally has a chance to try on her new tiara - but then she loses it in the Num Noms pantry.

2.title: Rainbow Crumb's Skating Spectacular
2.plot: Rainbow Crumbs is a rookie skater and has lots to learn from Candie Puffs, who can totally shred. But when one of Rainbow Crumb's tricks doesn't go as planned, the bowl Candie Puffs is using as a half-pipe flips and traps her inside. Now it's up to Rainbow Crumb to find a way to rescue her.

3.title: Cheri Crisp's Sweet Surprise
3.plot: Raspberry Cream is having a party with her friends Candy Hearts, Willy Waffles, and Mr. Icing in the Num Noms kitchen. Cheri Crisp is so excited to join in, she accidentally knocks over a jar of sprinkles. That causes sprinkles to rain over the party and break up the fun. Will Cheri Crisp find a way to save the special event?

4.title: Lady Sugarette's Perfect Plan
4.plot: The Num Noms are planning a surprise party for their friend Connie Confetti. But the birthday girl keeps almost stumbling onto their party prep and it's up to Lady Sugarette to make sure the secret reveal isn't spoiled.

5.title: Sprinkle Berry's Kite Chaos
5.plot: Sprinkle Berry can't wait to fly her new kite in the Num Noms kitchen, but once she gets it in the air it seems like everything goes wrong.

6.title: Poppy Pop's Snowy Sculpture
6.plot: Poppy Pop is creating a snow sculpture in the Num Noms freezer with help from her Light-Up Nom friends Cotton Rock Light-Up and Blueberry Gem Light-Up. Mint Twirl is supposed to be the model, but she keeps wandering off, ruining the sculpture and distracting the helpers.

7.title: Madelyn Macaron's Field Trip Frenzy
7.plot: Madelyn Macaron is exploring the Num Noms kitchen on a field trip with her friends Cherry Polish-It and Blueberry Polish-It. But after a stop at the castle, the Lip Gloss Truck's driver, Van Minty, accidentally leaves without Madelyn.

8.title: It's Showtime, Cherry Gem Light-Up
8.plot: Inspired by Cake Bear's beautiful voice, Cherry Gem Light-Up and Blue Razz Rock Light-Up get a signing lesson from Razz Rock, but they're still off-key. Will they find a way a way to join in on Cake Bear's performance?

9.title: Bella Bubblegum's Surprise in a Jar
9.plot: Bella Bubblegum and Sara S'mores are having a blast playing in the #NumNoms kitchen when things go awry and Sara starts floating away. It's up to Bella Bubblegum to save the day.

10.title: Party Over Here Violet Contessa!
10.plot: Violet Contessa is busy getting all her chocolate morsels in place - organizing them into pyramids and other shapes. At the same time, Van Minty and Candie Puffs are enjoying some popping party tunes outside Violet's home. However, the noise soon gets to be too much for Violet Contessa's careful creations.

imdb.plot outline: A cupful of cuteness and a spoonful of surprise makes Num Noms. To create your own flavor fusion mix a NUM and a NOM - it's the perfect recipe for mischief with so many wacky combos. The Num Noms are the cutest, play mini food dishes! And, they smell so delicious. Scoop 'em all up!
imdb.title: Num Noms Snackables
plot: A cupful of cuteness and a spoonful of surprise makes Num Noms. To create your own flavor fusion mix a NUM and a NOM - it's the perfect recipe for mischief with so many wacky combos. The Num Noms are the cutest, play mini food dishes! And, they smell so delicious. Scoop 'em all up!
